Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Seth Jones?

Seth Jones is 30 years old.

When was Seth Jones born?

Seth Jones was born on October 3, 1994.

Where was Seth Jones born?

Seth Jones was born in Arlington, Texas.

How tall is Seth Jones?

Seth Jones is 6-4 (193 cm) tall.

How much does Seth Jones weigh?

Seth Jones weighs 213 lbs (96 kg).

How many goals does Seth Jones have?

Seth Jones had 9 goals last season and 99 goals over his career.

How many points does Seth Jones have?

Seth Jones had 36 points last season and 441 points over his career.

How many Stanley Cups has Seth Jones won?

Seth Jones has won 1 Stanley Cup as a player.
